variations.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to 240% of ATK to all enemies, dispels their buffs, reduces their ATK by 20% for 5s. When in Dragon form, also reduces their Physical DEF by 30% of Ella's ATK for 10s.
Deals Physical DMG equal to 280% of ATK to all enemies, dispels their buffs, reduces their ATK by 20% for 5s. When in Dragon form, also reduces their Physical DEF by 30% of Ella's ATK for 10s.
Deals Physical DMG equal to 320% of ATK to all enemies, dispels their buffs, reduces their ATK by 20% for 5s. When in Dragon form, also reduces their Physical DEF by 30% of Ella's ATK for 10s.
Deals Physical DMG equal to 360% of ATK to all enemies, dispels their buffs, reduces their ATK by 20% for 5s. When in Dragon form, also reduces their Physical DEF by 30% of Ella's ATK for 10s.
Deals Physical DMG equal to 400% of ATK to all enemies, dispels their buffs, reduces their ATK by 20% for 5s. When in Dragon form, also reduces their Physical DEF by 30% of Ella's ATK for 10s.
Normal Attack deals damage to all enemies. Increases Ella's damage dealt by 30% and her max Health by 50%.
Normal Attack deals damage to all enemies. Increases Ella's damage dealt by 35% and her max Health by 50%.
Normal Attack deals damage to all enemies. Increases Ella's damage dealt by 40% and her max Health by 50%.
Normal Attack deals damage to all enemies. Increases Ella's damage dealt by 45% and her max Health by 50%.
Normal Attack deals damage to all enemies. Increases Ella's damage dealt by 50% and her max Health by 50%.
Recovers 2.5% of max Health per second and reduces damage taken by 10%.
Recovers 5% of max Health per second and reduces damage taken by 20%.

skins.name: Noble Bloodline
skins.description: Ella realized that her behavior was not in keeping with her noble status and decided to change.
